Introduction
This topic contains information on the SC death burial allowance, including
general eligibility for the SC burial allowance
payment amount for the SC burial allowance
when to send a claim for a rating decision on SC death
treatment of IU for the SC burial allowance
burial benefits payable in addition to the SC burial allowance
burial claim received after the SC burial allowance is paid
example of a burial claim received after the SC burial allowance is paid
SC burial allowance claim received after the NSC burial allowance is adjudicated
example of SC burial allowance claim received after the NSC burial allowance is paid
, and
transportation benefit claim received with or after the SC burial allowance is paid for deaths on or after January 5, 2023
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B  - Burial Benefits
